name: Plano Um
description:
Hello humans!

Welcome to my firt project as a solo dev!
This is a first person puzzle game with 3 stages, each stage has 3 levels.
It's pretty quick to finish, has 14 collectables and a time counter (as dev, i made my way through in 22 minutes).

I'm brazilian so it's in portuguese and english so, enjoy!
Sound Track credits to pixelsphere.org
